lead_paragraph: Jay Haas withstood wet, cold and eventually windy conditions to shoot the only under-par round and take the lead at the Senior P.G.A. Championship at Oak Hill in Rochester. Wearing a heavy windbreaker buttoned to his neck, Haas finished the first round with a one-under 69 to hold a one-shot lead over the local favorite Jeff Sluman and the New Jersey professional Bill Britton.
